Israel's Ashdod port sees strategic risk from China during Gaza warIsrael's government-run port of Ashdod has complained that a rival Chinese-run terminal at the northern port of Haifa has become a strategic risk during the Gaza war. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:45:30 GMT HVAJGYHQSJPLLCO3BYLJUSG6JQ https://www.reuters.com/world/israels-ashdod-port-sees-strategic-risk-china-during-gaza-war-2024-01-26/Ari Rabinovitch, Jonathan Saul世界
World Court recognises right of Palestinians in Gaza to be protected from acts of genocideThe United Nations' top court said on Friday that at least some rights sought by South Africa in its genocide case against Israel's war in Gaza are plausible. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:35:43 GMT FLKZYNDCQZLFFO74H24TXV52FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-recognises-right-palestinians-gaza-be-protected-acts-genocide-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东
Top U.N. court says it has jurisdiction to rule over South Africa's demands against IsraelThe United Nations' top court on Friday said it has jurisdiction to rule over emergency measures demanded by South Africa in its case against Israel's war in Gaza. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:24:07 GMT LAIHS2FMSVJTXBYICHGAC5OBLA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/top-un-court-says-it-has-jurisdiction-rule-over-south-africas-demands-against-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine invites China's Xi to 'peace summit' - Zelenskiy's top adviserUkraine has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping to participate in a planned "peace summit" of world leaders in Switzerland, a top diplomatic adviser to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said, as Russia's invasion approaches its second anniversary. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:15:08 GMT ZKDXGZBEIVNNJMX6XDQ6ZHNLPA https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraine-invites-chinas-xi-peace-summit-zelenskiys-top-adviser-2024-01-26/Olena Harmash世界
Meloni looks to reset Italy's relations with AfricaAfrican leaders converge on Rome this weekend for a summit where Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni will finally unveil a strategic plan aimed at redefining Italy's relations with the continent and curbing immigration. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:56:27 GMT IQVAYUAEQBIRBD2XGAY35INLPI https://www.reuters.com/world/meloni-looks-reset-italys-relations-with-africa-2024-01-26/Crispian Balmer世界
Pope says LGBT blessings are for individuals, not approval of unionsPope Francis on Friday defended a Vatican document on blessings for same-sex couples but said they were not an approval of a lifestyle the Church sees as potentially sinful but of individuals seeking to get closer to God. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:45:05 GMT FFWXMCKUQJIQVI3TIXFZ4B53UU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-says-lgbt-blessings-are-individuals-not-approval-unions-2024-01-26/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Ethiopia's deputy PM Demeke to be replaced by spy chief TemesgenEthiopia's deputy prime minister Demeke Mekonnen, who has occupied the post for over 11 years under three successive prime ministers, will be replaced by spy chief Temesgen Tiruneh, a senior government official told Reuters on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:28:58 GMT KGDDJRMY65LX7M6ARRNIMTJSJA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethiopias-deputy-pm-demeke-be-replaced-by-spy-chief-temesgen-2024-01-26/Reuters世界非洲
Taiwan reports Chinese 'combat patrols' ahead of China-US talksTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected 23 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Friday, ahead of high-level China-U.S. talks in Thailand. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:24:38 GMT FOJ6OFWD6RPETDHFWU5UQYSSGY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-chinese-combat-patrols-ahead-china-us-talks-2024-01-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Brazil Indigenous group's crisis persists after 308 deaths in 2023, report saysThe Brazilian government's effort to evict illegal gold miners from the Yanomami Indigenous reservation in the northern Amazon has stalled with outsiders increasingly invading the vast territory, Yanomami leaders said on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:16:14 GMT WTSD5ULNGZIRNAGRQRGJMYVG3I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-indigenous-groups-crisis-persists-after-308-deaths-2023-report-says-2024-01-26/Anthony Boadle可持续发展土地利用与生物多样性
In Mexico, mothers of the missing turn to drones to look for unmarked gravesDrones mounted with thermosensitive cameras offer new hope to the relatives of missing children in their search for clues. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:10:35 GMT MFTIZLU5SZPWTPK3322X7AEZMY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-mothers-missing-turn-drones-look-unmarked-graves-2024-01-26/Jose Luis Osorio世界美洲
UN rights chief deplores US nitrogen gas executionThe United Nations human rights chief on Friday condemned the execution of a prisoner in the U.S. state of Alabama by nitrogen gas, saying the method could amount to torture. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 09:39:09 GMT ADMSVQPQA5M6FMKFURNAW2UDLI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/un-rights-chief-deplores-us-nitrogen-gas-execution-2024-01-26/Reuters世界美国
